originalText.text: It would be nice if the police didnâ€™t abuse their placards and park in No Parking zones meant for loading and unloading senior residents of the neighborhood.

originalText.text: I was blown away by the assistance that so many officers tried to provide me with my ridiculous situation! I cannot exactly say Iâ€™m a fan of law enforcement, but these individuals that I had the opportunity to deal with really impressed me by their demeanor, willingness to help and overall, they made me feel like they cared. Really great people in that particular precinct, very positive experience and super grateful for the help I received!

originalText.text:
Not toward this department, but to NYPD system. Called 311 today for lost (possibly stolen) Drivers license, want to file a report in case of identity theft. Then I sit in awkward silence,  call answerer did not ask me anything and straight up transferred my call to NY DMV. Come on, I have a California dl, and just wanna file a report to leave a paper trail. DMV canâ€™t do thatðŸ˜…

Guess I will use this review as my paper trail..

originalText.text: This department is dangerous they do not investigate cases and there is a lot of evidence and I can prove it and I will ensure that people who are dangerous and not conscientious are in jail.  This department can put people in jail for no reason, people are locked up in psychological hospitals for no reason, they are dangerous for society.  until they pay and answer for their criminal deeds, I will continue to publish and tell the whole world what they are doing to people.  in the photo this is me and this is the police did this to me 2019 March 16 at Union Square

originalText.text: My apartment had a break-in. I walked in on the person. We struggled and called the police. The person was taken away and I offered to make a report to five officers standing in a semicircle. They refuse to take a report. I went three days later asking to make report and they said they would call me back the next day after taking my information in person. They didn't and meanwhile were unprofessional and mocking.

The person was taken away and I offered to make a report to five officers standing in a semicircle. They refuse to take a report. I went three days later asking to make report and they said they would call me back the next day after taking my information in person. They didn't and meanwhile were unprofessional and mocking.
